name: Hugh Grant
summary:
Hugh Grant. Actor: Love Actually. Hugh Grant, one of Britain's best known faces, has been equally entertaining on-screen as well as in real life, and has had enough sense of humor to survive a media frenzy. He is known for his roles in Four Weddings and a Funeral (1994), with Andie MacDowell, Notting Hill (1999), opposite Julia Roberts, and Music and Lyrics (2007), opposite Drew Barrymore, among his other works.

He...
awards: Nominated for 2 Primetime Emmys | 25 wins & 72 nominations total
